title: How to Make Black Bean Salsa

steps.headline: Mix the corn and black beans together well in a medium size bowl.
Add the onion, tomatoes, and cilantro and stir well.
Fold in the chilies, blending well.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

text: Mix the corn and black beans together well in a medium size bowl.  Add the onion, tomatoes, and cilantro and stir well.  Fold in the chilies, blending well.  Season with salt and pepper to taste.  Enjoy!
